file_content.text: Never let it be said I'm not generous in defeat. You can have this incredible marvel of starship design at a twenty-percent discount.
Thirty percent?
Your composure is impressive.
You were obviously hired for your negotiating skills. It certainly wasn't for shipbuilding.
I'm a big-picture man. Details are for little people.
Project Failsafe is falling to pieces, and you're still negotiating? Some Jedi work their entire lives to achieve that level of calm.
Rule number one: Never sweat the small stuff.
Maybe I should wait for something else to fall off. Get you down to half price.
Oh, good--you're open to haggling.
Let me get this straight: You're half dead and trying to sell me an unfinished starship? You must've taken the Hutts for a fortune.
Fortune and a half--but who's counting?
I don't think you understand the gravity of your situation.
Bad play, Veedrig.
Gravity, heh... good one.
Do you prefer quick executions? I'm leaning toward "slow and painful," myself.
Tell me how you want to die.
I'm hoping to bid you up. How about temporary crippling?
I admit the ship needs a little work, but she's almost ready to fly. Besides, being incomplete means there's room to customize.
Let me live, and I'll have this baby ready to leave the atmosphere in no time. You won't find a better offer--trust me.
Don't count on being trusted, but you can work for our people.
You can live.
Hello, Veedrig. Time to earn your pay.
Looking forward to it. Could you spare some kolto, first?
No deal. [Kill him]
That speech might've worked on a Hutt, but not me. Scum like you make me sick.
I'm in no mood to negotiate with a greedy thug. You earned your fate.
I've been blasting criminal scum since I got here. I don't see any reason to stop.
You must think I'm a complete idiot. Don't answer that. In fact, shut up.
This one's actually useful. We can put him to work.
Anything you want. I'll get my welding gloves.
Haven't had contact with the outside in weeks.... This is Foreman Tiero and Republic forces calling from Giant's Spear. Does anyone read?
Loud and clear, Tiero. We sent those Republic forces. What's the ark's status? Is it secure?
Bad news, Ilosov. Veedrig was scamming the Hutts. The ark is nowhere near complete.
The ark isn't finished.
Those idiot Hutts can't even save themselves right! Stand by....
Go ahead. Give him the bad news about the ark.
Tell him, Tiero.
It's incomplete, but... Is the ark that important?
The ark's only half-finished. There's no way we can evacuate the planet with this pile of junk.
You're all doomed.
Evacuate the planet? What are you talking about?
We can't just give up. Stand by.
Foreman, this is Shalim Avesta. Makeb's core is tearing apart, and we can't stop it. That ark is our people's only hope of escape.
If I send you every able body I have and guarantee your safety, can you finish the ark in time to evacuate our world?
I'll blasted well try.
The Hutts are surely organizing a counterattack. We're forming a battle plan to defeat it. We'll brief you back here--hurry.
We sealed the blast door to keep Hutt reinforcements out, but there's bound to be another way out of here.
On our way.
If the Hutts are striking back, should we leave these workers and the ark unguarded?
Will Tiero be safe alone?
You locked the main blast door. We can hold out until reinforcements get here.
These workers might run the moment we leave. Someone should keep an eye on them.
I don't trust these people.
We've all got families. You think we'd just leave them?
The foreman knows what's at stake if they don't finish the ark. We can trust him.
Veedrig kept a private shuttle pad nearby. You can take his transport while we get to work.
You're still talking? Seriously?
Got the best Ugnaught engineer in four sectors on retainer. She's a genius with electro-plumbing.
You'll have the classiest refresher on Coruscant, boss.
Still can't decide what to put in the sonic shower. Felucian glimmer-stones look so elegant, but I love Rylothian onyx tile.
You must be Veedrig--and this is Project Failsafe. There's been a change of plan. You don't work for the Hutts anymore.
Surrender the ark.
Feel free to go solve your interior-decorating problem. This entire facility is now Republic property.
Ah... decisions, decisions.
Why settle for just one? They're both excellent gravestones--and your days are numbered.
You can be buried under both.
You're those Republic people Toborro's screaming about on the holo.
You're that Republic hero Toborro's screaming about on the holo.
The Cartel's so worried, they're paying double to finish the ark ahead of schedule. That's on top of what they're offering to kill you....
I'll be so rich after this!
C'mon, you stupid droids!
All right, fine--you win!
